item.title: "Feces of mopar"
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:172, topic:415904”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=517846.msg3764392#msg3764392 date=1317122516]
Uhh, pardon me, but I would love to know why I was singled out along with them like typing like a retard. In fact I’ve been telling them to stop as I haven’t yet due to the fact I can’t read the text that comes out as drub attempts to type with his elbow.
[/quote]

My apologies, I was browsing from my blackberry and I couldn’t remember who all had taken part in it.

That and krackkid has only made, what, one post like that in this whole thread?

This thread was the tipping point for me. He’s the ringleader of a group of people who are the quintessential representation of what it truly means to be a moparscaper. It just gets old after a bit and I’m sure I’m not the only one who feels that way.[/quote]I agree, the posts you talk about are pretty annoying, but I feel as though kracky has been getting a little better recently. Not like, astoundingly better, but definitely an improvement.

Read full topic
